description: If you’re exploring Tokyo Tower and nearby Azabudai Hills, don’t miss % Arabica on the 4th floor. This sleek new space offers another chance to enjoy our coffee in a fresh setting—perfect if you’ve already visited the basement shop and want a different vibe.
address: Hills Tower Plaza 4F, 1-3-1 Azabudai, Minato City, Tokyo 106-0041
